root: ^The War continued, much to the surprise of the other house leaders. However, it was not long before the houses were dissolved and unity had been achieved.
^Many realized the fight was meaningless, and many even joined in on your efforts! Though the world became much different, most citizens adjusted quickly and continued their lives.

^However, Yvel and Ariar found themselves quite surprised when you announced House Cherry Blossom would also be dissolved. At that point, there was no ruler of the world, and the people were truly free of higher control.
^With this, the citizens seized their own destines and lived their lives as best they could.
